Class ChatPresentacion

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • es.dam.chat.presentacion.ChatPresentacion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class ChatPresentacion
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Esta clase es la encargada de gestionar la GUI del chat así.
    Since:
    21/02/2016
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Hernan Darío Villamil y Elizabeth Gordon
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
